title: 😍Spacious 1 Bedroom W/ Great Light In The Heart Of Downtown Bothell!
neighborhood: Bothell, Kenmore, Kirkland, Lynnwood, Lake City, Bellevue
posting_body: The (104) Apartments
At The (104) Apartments you will be close to everything that makes Downtown Bothell flourish and thrive.
We are located within 5 min walking to multiple restaurants including Poquitos, Stack 571, Prime Steak House, Amaro Bistro, The Cottage, and much more.
Walk and buy all your kitchen needs from local grocery stores, hop on The Burke Gillman trail steps from your home, or visit the Bothell Landing Park and escape outdoors!
You'll never want to leave this neighborhood.
But if you need to, that's easy too, with fast access to the i405 and 520 you will be in Bellevue and Seattle in no time.
This neighborhood is vibrant.
It's convenient.
It's where you want to be.

Tuesday-Friday: 10am-6pm
Saturday 10am-6pm
Pets: We allow cats and dogs, goldfish too!
Pet Details: $300 refundable deposit, $250 non-refundable fee, 2 pets per apartment limit.
Ask us about our breed restrictions.
Leases: Anywhere between 6-15 months- ask us for details!
Application fee: $44
Home Features
•	Convenient key-less entry to the building
•	Superior kitchen design with market-leading standard features: Stainless steel appliances, spacious pantries, ample amounts of cabinets, and under-mount sinks with retractable faucets
•	Separate closed off bedroom with attached bathroom
•	Take your pick from 3 different color schemes*
•	Large windows for natural light
•	GREEN INITIATIVE Building with LED Lighting
•	Unique kitchen styles*
•	Engineered hardwood, polished concrete, and carpet flooring*
•	Pick your view of our vibrant interior courtyard or views of Downtown Bothell*br>*In select units
Property Features
•	Recharge and start your mornings with our self-serve coffee bar complete with electronic barista!
•	Host your next event in our community room or  our outdoor community courtyard, with grills, patio-style seating, and a community fire pit
•	Kick back in our community room, equipped with demo kitchen, shuffleboard, big screen TV
•	Receive your packages on your own time with 24/7 access to a package storage room
•	Skip your gym membership and enjoy our complimentary state of the art fitness facility<br
Management Philosophy
"Here at The (104), we believe that finding a new home is more than just the apartment features.
I invite you to approach your tour as an opportunity to engage me almost like you were interviewing me.
Finding the perfect management fit for your lifestyle is just as important as finding the right closet.
Our management philosophy is that the relationship doesn't end when the lease is signed.
We take our responsibility of your home seriously.
We understand it is your place to escape to, a place to center yourself each night, a place that should be kept exactly as you like.
